title: Eurostile-like typeface used for Land Rover headlines
content:
I’m desperate to identify this typeface used in Land Rover ads.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081102022753im_/http:/typophile.com/files/21150-LandRoverL_3721.jpeg)

Regards,  
Joel Newman  
Montreal  
(former Microgramma/Eurostile fanatic)

 [‹ New Hampshire lettering](http://web.archive.org/web/20081102022753/http:/typophile.com/node/49894 "Go to previous forum topic") [menchie's font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081102022753/http:/typophile.com/node/49911 "Go to next forum topic")
author: joelnewman

comments.content:
I think this looks like [Foundry Monoline](http://web.archive.org/web/20081102022753/http:/www.foundrytypes.co.uk/foundry_monoline/monoline_exbold.html) Extra bold.

- Mike Yanega

Yes it is, Mike. Most appreciated. I had been searching and searching...

—Joel Newman
